alert.note: Alert for Ford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ford County through 515 PM CDT... At 429 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm very near Dodge City, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ft. Dodge around 440 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Dodge City and Wright. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
